titleInfo.title: Concept and Experiences of Prototyping in a Software-Engineering Environment with NATURAL

mods.abstract: This paper describes how prototyping is made possible by using powerful tools ina software engineering environment based on a phase model. Prototyping is considered to be a useful technique within a detailed concept of software production rather than such a concept itself.

titleInfo.title: Approaches to Prototyping: Proceedings of the Working Conference on Prototyping, Namur, Oct. 1983
